description: This file defines a React context provider (AppProvider) for managing application state related to Jira and Confluence integrations, including data fetching, state updates, and UI state management.

methods.name: loadJiraProjects
methods.description: Fetches Jira projects from the API and updates the state, also shows notifications based on success or failure.

methods.name: selectJiraProject
methods.description: Sets the selected Jira project in the state.

methods.name: clearJiraError
methods.description: Clears any error message related to Jira data.

methods.name: resetJiraData
methods.description: Resets Jira-related data to initial state.

methods.name: loadConfluenceSpaces
methods.description: Fetches Confluence spaces from the API and updates the state, with notifications.

methods.name: selectConfluenceSpace
methods.description: Selects a Confluence space and resets space content.

methods.name: loadConfluenceSpaceContent
methods.description: Fetches the content of a specific Confluence space.

methods.name: clearConfluenceError
methods.description: Clears any error message related to Confluence data.

methods.name: resetConfluenceData
methods.description: Resets Confluence-related data to initial state.

methods.name: selectService
methods.description: Sets the active service (Jira or Confluence).

methods.name: setSidebarCollapsed
methods.description: Explicitly sets the sidebar collapsed or expanded.

methods.name: addNotification
methods.description: Adds a notification message to the UI.

methods.name: removeNotification
methods.description: Removes a notification message by ID.
